TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ObjectCache extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, object>>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class ObjectCache Implements IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, Object))
public ref class ObjectCache abstract : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::Object ^>>

summary.span: 表示物件快取，並提供存取物件快取所需的基底方法和屬性。

span.span: Represents an object cache and provides the base methods and properties for accessing the object cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類型是記憶體中物件快取的主要類型。The type is the primary type for the in-memory object cache. 若要開發的自訂快取實作，衍生自類別。To develop a custom cache implementation, you derive from the class. > [!NOTE] > 類別是從新[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。The class is new as of the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 內建類別衍生自類別。The built-in class derives from the class. 類別是在只有具象的物件快取實作[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]衍生自類別。The class is the only concrete object cache implementation in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] that derives from the class.

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

para.span: 因為類型代表只有一般的快取函式，讓您不需要必須具現化並取得執行個體。

span.span: Because the type represents only common cache functions, there is no requirement for how an instance must be instantiated and obtained.

para.span: 此外，還有的具體實作不需要類別必須是 singleton。

span.span: In addition, there is no requirement that concrete implementations of the class must be singletons.

block.para: 不是單一值，但您應該建立只有少數或可能只有一個執行個體和快取項目中的程式碼應該使用這些執行個體。
is not a singleton, but you should create only a few or potentially only one instance and code that caches items should use those instances.

Docs.span: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫其方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you must override its methods.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ObjectCache ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: ObjectCache();

summary.span: 從衍生類別的建構函式進行呼叫，以初始化 類別。

span.span: Called from constructors in derived classes in order to initialize the class.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，在快取中插入快取項目，而不要求傳回具有相符索引鍵的現有快取項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, inserts a cache entry into the cache, without requiring that an existing cache entry with a matching key be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載嘗試要插入至快取，快取項目，而不需要覆寫或移除現有的快取項目具有相同索引鍵。The method overloads try to insert a cache entry into the cache, without overwriting or removing an existing cache entry that has the same key. 快取項目可以為具型別的物件或泛型物件。The cache entry can be a typed object or a generic object. 方法多載而方法多載包含有一個重大差異。The method overloads and the method overloads have one significant difference. 當這些方法插入快取項目，如果快取中，找到符合的項目方法多載會傳回現有的快取項目，但方法多載則否。When these methods insert a cache entry, if a matching entry is found in the cache, the method overloads return the existing cache entry, but the method overloads do not. 讓這些不同的方法多載可讓呼叫端若要最佳化程式碼根據它們是否需要現有的快取項目。Having these different method overloads enables callers to optimize their code based on whether they need the existing cache entry. 在分散式快取，請使用，現有的值傳回方法可能會比使用傳回的布林值更為昂貴方法。In distributed caches, returning an existing value by using the method might be more expensive than returning a Boolean value by using method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Add (System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem item, System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy policy);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Add(class System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem item, class System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy policy) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Add (item As CacheItem, policy As CacheItemPolicy) As Boolean
public: virtual bool Add(System::Runtime::Caching::CacheItem ^ item, System::Runtime::Caching::CacheItemPolicy ^ policy);

param.name: item
param.span: 要加入的物件。

span.span: The object to add.

param.name: policy
param.span: 物件，包含快取項目的收回詳細資料。

span.span: An object that contains eviction details for the cache entry.

param.span: 這個物件提供的收回選項比簡單絕對期限要多。

span.span: This object provides more options for eviction than a simple absolute expiration.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，嘗試在快取區中插入做為 執行個體的快取項目，並加入項目清除方式的詳細資訊。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, tries to insert a cache entry into the cache as a instance, and adds details about how the entry should be evicted.

returns.span: 如果插入成功則為 ，如果快取中已經有項目具有與 相同的索引鍵，則為 。

span.span: if insertion succeeded, or if there is an already an entry in the cache that has the same key as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載都是虛擬的 (非 abstract) 上類別，因為方法會在內部呼叫。The method overloads are virtual (not abstract) on the class, because the method internally calls . 這會減少快取實作者必須提供的方法多載的數目。This reduces the number of method overloads that a cache implementer has to provide. 如果快取實作不需要任何特殊行為的方法，但它可以只實作方法多載。If a cache implementation does not require any special behavior for the method, it can just implement the method overloads.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, inserts a cache entry into the cache without overwriting any existing cache entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載都是虛擬的 (非 abstract) 上類別，因為方法會在內部呼叫。The method overloads are virtual (not abstract) on the class, because the method internally calls . 這會減少快取實作者必須提供的方法多載的數目。This reduces the number of method overloads that a cache implementer has to provide. 如果快取實作不需要任何特殊行為的方法，但它可以只實作方法多載。If a cache implementation does not require any special behavior for the method, it can just implement the method overloads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載都是虛擬的 (非 abstract) 上類別，因為方法會在內部呼叫。The method overloads are virtual (not abstract) on the class, because the method internally calls . 這會減少快取實作者必須提供的方法多載的數目。This reduces the number of method overloads that a cache implementer has to provide. 如果快取實作不需要任何特殊行為的方法，但它可以只實作方法多載。If a cache implementation does not require any special behavior for the method, it can just implement the method overloads.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，嘗試在快取區中插入快取項目，並傳回包含相符索引鍵的現有快取項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, tries to insert a cache entry into the cache, and returns an existing cache entry with a matching key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載插入至快取的項目。The method overloads insert an entry into the cache. 如果有相符的索引鍵的快取項目已經存在，就會傳回現有的項目。If a cache entry with a matching key already exists, they return the existing entry. 快取項目可以是物件或泛型物件。The cache entry can be a object or a generic object. 之間的差異在於多載而多載。There is one difference between the overloads and the overloads. 當這些多載的方法嘗試插入的快取項目，如果找到現有的項目，具有符合現有的索引鍵插入快取項目，多載會傳回現有的快取項目。When these overloaded methods try to insert a cache entry, if an existing entry is found that has a key that matches an existing inserted cache entry, the overloads return the existing cache entry. 多載則否。The overloads do not.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor CreateCacheEntryChangeMonitor (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> keys, string regionName = null);

Public MustOverride Function CreateCacheEntryChangeMonitor (keys As IEnumerable(Of String), Optional regionName As String = null) As CacheEntryChangeMonitor

param.name: keys
param.span: 要監控之快取項目的唯一識別項。

span.span: The unique identifiers for cache entries to monitor.

param.name: regionName
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 如果已實作區域，則為快取中存在 keys 參數中之快取索引鍵的具名區域。

span.span: A named region in the cache where the cache keys in the keys parameter exist, if regions are implemented.

param.span: 選擇性參數的預設值為 。

span.span: The default value for the optional parameter is .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時建立 物件，此物件可觸發事件以回應特定快取項目的變更。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a object that can trigger events in response to changes to specified cache entries.

returns.span: 監控快取區快取項目的變更監視器。

span.span: A change monitor that monitors cache entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當衍生類別會覆寫基底方法，必須建立快取實作物件。When a derived class overrides the base method, the cache implementation must create a object. 此特製化的變更監視中指定的快取項目變更時，告知呼叫端`keys`參數。This specialized change monitor notifies callers when there are changes to the cache entries that are specified in the `keys` parameter. 例如，如果受監視的項目中`keys`更新或從快取中移除參數，這個方法所建立的變更監視器都會觸發事件。For example, if a monitored item in the `keys` parameter is updated or removed from the cache, the change monitor created by this method triggers an event. 字串值，如果快取實作支援具名快取區域，可以指定為`regionName`參數。If a cache implementation supports named cache regions, a string value can be specified as the `regionName` parameter. 否則，此參數預設為`null`。Otherwise, the parameter defaults to `null`. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的快取實作會支援快取項目的變更監視器。Not all cache implementations support cache-entry change monitors. 若要判斷您的快取實作是否支援物件，請參閱特定快取實作的文件。To determine whether your cache implementation supports objects, see the documentation for the specific cache implementation.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，從快取區中取得做為 執行個體的指定快取項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the specified cache entry from the cache as a instance.

returns.span: 由 識別的快取項目。

span.span: The cache entry that is identified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載存在，因為某些快取實作可能會延長類別。This method overload exists because some cache implementations might extend the class. 在此情況下，方法多載不會一定傳回快取資料的所有資訊。In that case, the method overload will not necessarily return all the information about cached data. 不過，方法多載可讓自訂快取傳回不只是快取的值。However, the method overload enables custom caches to return more than just the cache value. 方法就像方法，不同處在於方法會傳回傳回做為快取項目執行個體。The method is like the method, except that the method returns return the cache entry as a instance.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時建立列舉程式，這個列舉程式可以用來逐一查看快取項目的集合。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates an enumerator that can be used to iterate through a collection of cache entries.

returns.span: 列舉程式物件，可用來存取快取區的快取項目。

span.span: The enumerator object that provides access to the cache entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取實作者可以覆寫，並擴充此方法以提供自訂方法來逐一查看快取項目的集合。Cache implementers can override and extend this method to provide a custom means of iterating through a collection of cache entries. > [!NOTE] > 傳回列舉值通常是更昂貴的作業，比傳回整個快取項目。Returning an enumerator is typically a more expensive operation than returning the entire cache entry. 呼叫這個方法是明確介面實作，類別具有的和方法。This method is called by the explicit interface implementations that the class has for the and methods.

summary.span: 取得一組快取項目。

span.span: Gets a set of cache entries.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，取得對應至指定索引鍵的快取項目組。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a set of cache entries that correspond to the specified keys.

returns.span: 字典，表示快取項目的索引鍵/值組。

span.span: A dictionary of key/value pairs that represent cache entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載是支援單一網路通話期間，從快取擷取多個快取項目的分散式快取的效能最佳化。The method overload is a performance optimization for distributed caches that support fetching multiple cache entries from the cache during a single network call. 雖然呼叫端可以傳遞至方法的一個或多個索引鍵，也不會保證所有索引鍵代表快取中的項目。Although a caller can pass one or more keys to the method, there is no guarantee that all keys represent entries in the cache. 因此，傳回的字典可能會包含項目數量小於跟著傳遞至此方法的索引鍵數目。Therefore, the returned dictionary might contain fewer items than the number of keys that were passed to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載就像是方法多載，但可讓您使用選擇性參數的語法支援的 managed 語言，例如 C# 傳遞命名的範圍。The method overload is like the method overload, but lets you pass the named region by using optional parameter syntax that is supported by managed languages such as C#. 此方法是一種虛擬方法，因為類別會提供預設實作會傳遞`params`陣列方法多載。This method is a virtual method because the class provides a default implementation that passes the `params` array to the method overload.

MemberSignature.Value: public static IServiceProvider Host { get; set; }
.property class System.IServiceProvider Host
Public Shared Property Host As IServiceProvider
public: static property IServiceProvider ^ Host { IServiceProvider ^ get(); void set(IServiceProvider ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Managed 主機環境的參考，這個環境可供 實作使用，並且可以提供主機特定服務給 實作。

span.span: Gets or set a reference to a managed hosting environment that is available to implementations and that can provide host-specific services to implementations.

value.span: 知道此快取的 Managed 主機環境的參考。

span.span: A reference to a cache-aware managed hosting environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性適用於由[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]裝載環境和快取實作，可實作取決於.NET Framework 的行為由裝載環境。The property is intended for use by [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] host environments and by cache implementations that implement behavior that depends on the .NET Framework host environment. 下表列出的主機環境服務，可能會提供 managed 裝載環境，以及可用來設定透過實作屬性：The following table lists the set of host environment services that might be available from a managed hosting environment and that are available to implementations through the property: |服務Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||可讓主機環境提供的功能，例如識別效能計數器的快取實作，可能需要的應用程式網域識別項。Lets host environments provide application domain identifiers that might be needed by a cache implementation for features such as identifying performance counters.| ||可讓主機環境提供自訂的檔案變更通知系統，而不是使用中提供一個[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。Lets host environments provide a custom file-change notification system, instead of using the one provided in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].| ||可讓快取實作報表快取記憶體耗用量給主機環境。Lets cache implementations report cache memory consumption to the host environment. 這可讓主機環境，來集中管理跨多個快取實作的記憶體耗用量。This enables host environments to centrally manage memory consumption across multiple cache implementations.| > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性值的呼叫端需要不受限制的程式碼存取安全性權限。Callers of this property value require unrestricted code access security permissions.

span.span: The value being assigned to the property is .

exception.span: 嘗試設定屬性值一次以上。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property value more than one time.

permission.span: 這個屬性的所有存取子的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for all accessors of this property.

permission.span: 這個屬性不能由部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This property cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly DateTimeOffset InfiniteAbsoluteExpiration;
.field public static initonly valuetype System.DateTimeOffset InfiniteAbsoluteExpiration
Public Shared ReadOnly InfiniteAbsoluteExpiration As DateTimeOffset
public: static initonly DateTimeOffset InfiniteAbsoluteExpiration;

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示快取項目沒有絕對期限。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that a cache entry has no absolute expiration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取項目插入至快取欄位值設定為到期值應永遠不會過期的時間根據絕對點。A cache entry that is inserted into the cache with the field value set as the expiration value should never expire based on an absolute point in time. 不過，這項設定的快取項目可以從快取收回，因為其他原因而是由特定快取實作，例如記憶體不足的壓力所造成的變更監視器事件收回。However, a cache entry with this setting can be evicted from the cache for other reasons that are determined by a particular cache implementation, such as a change-monitor event eviction caused by memory pressure.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object this[string key] { get; set; }
.property instance object Item(string)
Default Public MustOverride Property Item(key As String) As Object
public: abstract property System::Object ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::String ^ key); void set(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value); };

param.name: key
param.span: 快取中快取項目的唯一識別項。

span.span: A unique identifier for a cache entry in the cache.

summary.span: 取得或設定 類別的預設索引子。

span.span: Gets or sets the default indexer for the class.

value.span: 索引鍵，做為快取執行個體中的索引子。

span.span: A key that serves as an indexer into the cache instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的 set 存取子的行為就像是方法。The behavior of the set accessor of this property is like the method. 就內部而言，快取實作無法設定指定的值絕對期限方法。Internally, a cache implementation could set the absolute expiration of the specified value to the method. 此行為但最終仍是根據快取實作。However this behavior is ultimately up to the cache implementation. Get 存取子的行為就像呼叫方法與使用`null`區域名稱。The behavior of get accessor is like calling the method and using `null` for the region name.

Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Name As String

summary.span: 取得特定 執行個體的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of a specific instance.

value.span: 特定快取執行個體的名稱。

span.span: The name of a specific cache instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些快取實作可能支援執行單一應用程式中的快取多個執行個體。Some cache implementations might support multiple instances of the cache that is running in a single application. 這個屬性可讓快取實作者傳回可識別特定快取執行個體的名稱。This property lets cache implementers return a name that identifies a specific cache instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration;
.field public static initonly valuetype System.TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration
Public Shared ReadOnly NoSlidingExpiration As TimeSpan
public: static initonly TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration;

summary.span: 表示快取項目沒有滑動期限。

span.span: Indicates that a cache entry has no sliding expiration time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 持續時間或時間定義的視窗為基礎的到期日也稱為滑動期限。Expiration that is based on duration or a defined window of time is also referred to as sliding expiration. 一般來說，收回項目，根據滑動期限的快取實作，將會移除未存取指定的時間視窗中的項目。Normally, a cache implementation that evicts items that are based on sliding expiration will remove an item that has not been accessed in the specified window of time. 快取項目插入至快取欄位設定為到期值應永遠不會收回滑動的時間間隔中的非活動導致的值。A cache entry that is inserted into the cache with the field value set as the expiration value should never be evicted because of non-activity in a sliding time window. 不過，如果它絕對期限，或某些其他收回事件發生時，這類變更監視器或記憶體不足的壓力會收回快取項目。However, a cache item can be evicted if it has an absolute expiration, or if some other eviction event occurs, such a change monitor or memory pressure.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object Remove (string key, string regionName = null);

param.span: 選擇性參數的預設值為 。

span.span: The default value for the optional parameter is .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，從快取區中移除快取項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, removes the cache entry from the cache.

returns.span: 物件，表示由索引鍵所指定之已移除快取項目的值，如果找不到指定的項目則為 。

span.span: An object that represents the value of the removed cache entry that was specified by the key, or if the specified entry was not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您覆寫這個方法在自訂快取實作中，對應至快取中快取項目是否`key`，應傳回移除之項目的值。If you override this method in a custom cache implementation, if there is a cache entry in the cache that corresponds to `key`, the value of the removed item should be returned. 如果執行任何動作已從快取中移除，這個方法應傳回`null`。If nothing was removed from the cache, the method should return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 某些分散式快取實作，可能不支援傳回值，已從快取中移除的功能。Some distributed cache implementations might not support the ability to return the value that was removed from the cache. 這可能是因為快取實作不支援傳回已移除的快取項目的值。This might be because the cache implementation does not support returning the value of a removed cache item. 它也可能因為傳回的值是過於昂貴時，將物件封送處理。It might also be because marshaling the object as a return value is too expensive. 在這種情況下，快取實作可以傳回`null`。In such cases, cache implementations can return `null`.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，在快取區中插入快取項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, inserts a cache entry into the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的行為多載的方法是插入或更新作業。The typical behavior of the overload methods is an insert-or-update operation. 快取項目是 插入新項目為如果指定的項目不存在，或如果已經存在的新值更新快取項目。A cache entry is either inserted as a new entry if the specified entry does not exist, or the cache entry is updated with a new value if it already exists.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Set (System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem item, System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy policy);

param.name: item
param.span: 要加入的快取項目。

span.span: The cache item to add.

param.name: policy
param.span: 物件，包含快取項目的收回詳細資料。

span.span: An object that contains eviction details for the cache entry.

param.span: 這個物件提供的收回選項比簡單絕對期限要多。

span.span: This object provides more options for eviction than a simple absolute expiration.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，在快取中插入快取項目做為 執行個體，並指定關於要如何收回項目的資訊。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, inserts the cache entry into the cache as a instance, specifying information about how the entry will be evicted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果索引鍵`item`不存在，`item`會插入做為新的快取項目。If the key for `item` does not exist, `item` is inserted as a new cache entry. 如果有相符的索引鍵的項目`item`存在，請從值`item`用來更新或覆寫現有的快取項目的值。If an item with a key that matches `item` exists, the value from `item` is used to update or overwrite the value of the existing cache entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載可讓您提供比以時間為基礎的絕對期限中提供的更多的收回或到期詳細資料。This method overload lets you provide more eviction or expiration details than those that are available in time-based absolute expiration. 如果符合的項目`key`不存在於快取，`value`和`key`用來為新的快取項目插入。If an item that matches `key` does not exist in the cache, `value` and `key` are used to insert as a new cache entry. 如果有相符的索引鍵的項目`item`存在，請更新快取項目或使用覆寫`value`。If an item with a key that matches `item` exists, the cache entry is updated or overwritten by using `value`.

MemberSignature.Value: System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string,object>> IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string,object>>.GetEnumerator ();

summary.span: 支援泛型集合上的反覆運算。

span.span: Supports iteration over a generic collection.

returns.span: 列舉程式物件，可用來存取快取區的項目。

span.span: The enumerator object that provides access to the items in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在衍生時才能使用執行個體轉換成介面。It can be used only when a derived instance is cast to an interface. 開發人員可以使用這個方法來逐一查看快取項目的一般集合。Developers can use this method to iterate through a generic collection of cache entries. 這是預設實作會在內部呼叫方法。This is the default implementation that internally calls the method.
